text: It is not easy for beginners to learn Latin dance. If the movements are not in place, there will be no sense of achievement and it‘s easy to give up. Yukie is a good teacher. She has good skills meanwhile, most importantly, she has patience. Her patience and meticulousness made me persist. Thank you.

Was able to pick up Latin dancing from absolutely zero experience.

The key differentiator is that the Instructor is able to communicate patiently and emphasize on the right techniques to perform the dance movement.

Great community as well — Always positive vibes and open sharing of knowledge.
Everyone is here to enjoy and improve.
Zhou is really good dance teacher. I learnt a lot from his body movement lesson. Highly recommended.

Great studio, professional instructors+ lovely students + delightful atmosphere + perfect location+ good renovation.
I enjoy every single class and every minute there. Yes, 6 stars!

It’s limited choice in Singapore of finding an professional dancing studio until I found this in red book, the teacher has academic skill with fun communication. The class also designed with a diverse standard which includes different level of students. Btw lots of male students as well.
